name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-northwind-inventory-python
title: Northwind Inventory plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
shortDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.
longDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. The message extension allows users to query the Northwind Database

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of the sample extension working in Copilot in Microsoft Teams

references.name: Extend Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
references.description: Learn more about how to extend Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365

references.name: Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code
references.description: Learn more about the Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
